description: This seminar-style course focuses on a specific art-historical topic, and students learn how to pursue art-historical practice beyond the introductory level. Topics change with each offering. Offered periodically.
name: Top: Materiality of Medieval Art
notes: Full topic title: Gold, Stones, and Bones: The Materiality of Medieval Art
